item.description:
Digging into the hidden recesses of the American food industry, this documentary reveals the appalling amount of edible, nutritious goods that are thrown away—wasted—every day in a nation where millions of citizens still go hungry. Watch trailer here. (2010/55 min./not rated) Co-sponsored by RISD’s Respond|Design and Cable Car Cinema. Free.


I'll be there early to meetup with individuals outside of the Auditorium and will likely go in around 6 pm to get a good seat. Hope to see you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be sporting some sort of Penn State attire
item.name: Screening: Dive! Living Off America's Waste
